l4/re/util/counting_cap_alloc

00024 
00025 #pragma once
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/task>
00028 #include <l4/re/consts>
00029 
00030 namespace L4Re { namespace Util {
00031 
00032 template< typename COUNTER = unsigned char >
00033 struct Counter
00034 {
00035   typedef COUNTER Type;
00036   Type _cnt;
00037 
00038   static Type nil() { return 0; }
00039 
00040   void free() { _cnt = 0; }
00041   bool is_free() const { return _cnt == 0; }
00042   void inc() { ++_cnt; }
00043   Type dec() { return --_cnt; }
00044   void alloc() { _cnt = 1; }
00045 };
00046 
00051 template <typename COUNTERTYPE = L4Re::Util::Counter<unsigned char> >
00052 class Counting_cap_alloc
00053 {
00054 private:
00055   void operator = (Counting_cap_alloc const &) { }
00056   typedef COUNTERTYPE Counter;
00057 
00058   COUNTERTYPE *_items;
00059   long _free_hint;
00060   long _bias;
00061   long _capacity;
00062 
00063 
00064 public:
00065 
00066   template <unsigned COUNT>
00067   struct Counter_storage
00068   {
00069     COUNTERTYPE _buf[COUNT];
00070     typedef COUNTERTYPE Buf_type[COUNT];
00071     enum { Size = COUNT };
00072   };
00073 
00074 protected:
00075 
00076   Counting_cap_alloc() throw()
00077   : _items(0), _free_hint(0), _bias(0), _capacity(0)
00078   {}
00079 
00080   void setup(void *m, long capacity, long bias) throw()
00081   {
00082     _items = (Counter*)m;
00083     _capacity = capacity;
00084     _bias = bias;
00085   }
00086 
00087 public:
00088   L4::Cap<void> alloc() throw()
00089   {
00090     if (_free_hint >= _capacity)
00091       return L4::Cap_base::Invalid;
00092 
00093     for (long i = _free_hint; i < _capacity; ++i)
00094       {
00095   if (_items[i].is_free())
00096     {
00097       _items[i].alloc();
00098       _free_hint = i + 1;
00099 
00100       return L4::Cap<void>((i + _bias) << L4_CAP_SHIFT);
00101     }
00102       }
00103 
00104     return L4::Cap<void>::Invalid;
00105   }
00106 
00107   template <typename T>
00108   L4::Cap<T> alloc() throw()
00109   {
00110     return L4::cap_cast<T>(alloc());
00111   }
00112 
00113 
00114   void take(L4::Cap<void> cap) throw()
00115   {
00116     long c = cap.cap() >> L4_CAP_SHIFT;
00117     if (c < _bias)
00118       return;
00119 
00120     c -= _bias;
00121     if (c >= _capacity)
00122       return;
00123 
00124     _items[c].inc();
00125   }
00126 
00127 
00128   bool free(L4::Cap<void> cap, l4_cap_idx_t task = L4_INVALID_CAP,
00129             unsigned unmap_flags = L4_FP_ALL_SPACES) throw()
00130   {
00131     long c = cap.cap() >> L4_CAP_SHIFT;
00132     if (c < _bias)
00133       return false;
00134 
00135     c -= _bias;
00136 
00137     if (c >= _capacity)
00138       return false;
00139 
00140     if (task != L4_INVALID_CAP)
00141       l4_task_unmap(task, cap.fpage(), unmap_flags);
00142 
00143     if (c < _free_hint)
00144       _free_hint = c;
00145 
00146     _items[c].free();
00147 
00148     return true;
00149   }
00150 
00151   bool release(L4::Cap<void> cap, l4_cap_idx_t task = L4_INVALID_CAP,
00152                unsigned unmap_flags = L4_FP_ALL_SPACES) throw()
00153   {
00154     long c = cap.cap() >> L4_CAP_SHIFT;
00155     if (c < _bias)
00156       return false;
00157 
00158     c -= _bias;
00159 
00160     if (c >= _capacity)
00161       return false;
00162 
00163     if (_items[c].dec() == Counter::nil())
00164       {
00165   if (task != L4_INVALID_CAP)
00166     l4_task_unmap(task, cap.fpage(), unmap_flags);
00167 
00168   if (c < _free_hint)
00169     _free_hint = c;
00170 
00171   return true;
00172       }
00173     return false;
00174   }
00175 
00176 
00177   long last() throw()
00178   {
00179     return _capacity + _bias - 1;
00180   }
00181 };
00182 
00183 }}
00184
